name: Hungry Jelly Monster
description:
This Hungry Jelly Monster is a fun game app!

It is an addicting game that will keep users entertained for hours.Touch the left or right side of the screen to move your jelly monster. Don’t let the boxes falling down to knock the adorable jelly monster while you run to collect the candy!

It gets harder as the levels go on and you may exchange your points with more cutie jelly monster or new world background!

================
UNIQUE FEATURES
================

* Beautiful design
* Compete in the high score leaderboards
* Collect the candy when save the hungry jelly monster
* Challenging achievements with 4 new world backgrounds.
* Great music track

Hungry Jelly Monster game is great for every age. Young and older can compete against each other. Friends and families can enjoy and have lots of fun with this game.

Notes: This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.

Download Hungry Jelly Monster now and have fun!
